titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to James F. Tureman
CWG13767

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To J. F Tureman, Dr.

row.cell: For services rendered in assisting the organization of the Militia of the State during the month of April 1864.

body.p: The Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this account out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspector General, Quarter-Master.

Received at Frankfort Ky the 29th of April, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, Eighty three dollars and thirty three cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To J F Tureman, Dr.

row.cell: For services rendered in assisting the organization of the Militia of the State during the month of April, 1864

body.p: The Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this account out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspector General Quarter-Master.

Received at Frankfort Ky the 29 of April, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, Eighty three dollars and thirty three cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 22.
No Abstract.
J. F. Tureman
Dollars 83.33/100
